name.japanese: カラット・シズルドビーフ

description: An extremely rare and luxurious cut of meat said to be the most delicious in the world. This meat was offered as the grand prize for the IGO Food Tournament, though the tournament itself was ultimately revealed to be a ruse to attract powerful fighters.

ownershipHistory.methodLost: Given to participants by Mr. Satan

ownershipHistory.methodAcquired: Won tournament by default when Luffy, Toriko, and Goku destroyed the ring

significance: Served as the bait to gather powerful warriors from three different anime universes for the IGO's plan to capture Akami. The food's legendary status made it appealing to food-loving characters like Luffy, Toriko, and Goku.
appearance: Premium cut of meat with exceptional marbling and presentation
trivia: The meat exists in the Toriko universe and was used to attract characters from One Piece and Dragon Ball Z
Despite being the tournament prize, it was ultimately shared among all participants rather than going to a single winner
The meat's appeal perfectly suited the food-loving nature of all three main protagonists
